renderpass.code:
#define n(c)(sin(c+5.*iTime)+1.)*.5
#define r(a)mat2(cos(a),-sin(a),sin(a),cos(a))
#define S(x,y,z)length(max(vec3(x,y,z),0.))+min(max(x,max(y,z)),0.)
float v(vec3 v){v-=vec3(1);float a=iTime*.5;v.yz*=r(a);a*=3.;v.xz*=r(a);v=abs(v)-vec3(.3);vec3 m=abs(v+.03)-.03;return min(min(S(v.x,m.y,m.z),S(m.x,v.y,m.z)),S(m.x,m.y,v.z));}void mainImage(out vec4 x,vec2 a){vec3 m,y,z,c=vec3(0,.5,-1);y=normalize(vec3(a/iResolution.x,1));float i;for(int f=0;f<24;f++)i+=v(z),z=c+y*i;vec2 f=vec2(0,.01);m=vec3(.2,.2,.8)*abs(tan(iTime*3.));if(i<9.)m=(clamp(dot(vec3(.5),normalize(v(z)-vec3(v(z-f.yxx),v(z-f.xyx),v(z-f.xxy)))),0.,1.)+.5)*vec3(n(0.),n(2.1),n(4.2));x=vec4(m,1.00000);}
renderpass.name: Image
